full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GDON BGEGS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR NAG PHYOGS PA'I 'KHOR GNOD SEL THABS BKRA SHIS GANG 'KHYIL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES GDON BGEGS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR NAG PHYOGS PA'I 'KHOR GNOD SEL THABS BKRA SHIS GANG 'KHYIL ZHES BYA BA, 'DI NYID RIGS RUS SHIN TU MTHONG ZHING DAD DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA ZAG AO LO SONG THU SHI GUNG PA THUR TAS CHEN BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS DANG, AA NING KHE KHA THUG THABS BTZUN MO BRTZON 'GRUS PA DANG, SRAS PA THUR TAS CHEN RDO RJE PHA LAM DANG, LHA BTZUN PA DAR RGYAS SOGS KYI SKU'I RIM 'GROR DMIGS NAS, RIG 'DZIN TE DZA BADZRAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I SLOB BU 'PHRIN LAS STOBS LDAN GYIS BRIS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
